# RG8

**Type Property**

A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only red and green color components.

## Declaration

```swift
static let RG8: CIFormat
```

## Image Formats

- **A16**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.
- **A8**: An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.
- **ABGR8**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the alpha value precedes the blue, green, and red color components.
- **ARGB8**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the alpha value precedes the red, green, and blue color components.
- **Af**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, full-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.
- **Ah**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, half-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.
- **BGRA8**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the blue, green, and red color components precede the alpha value.
- **R16**: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.
- **R8**: An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.
- **RG16**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only red and green color components.
- **RGB10**
- **RGBA16**: A 64-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format.
- **RGBX16**
- **RGBA8**: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the red, green, and blue color components precede the alpha value.
- **RGBAf**: A 128-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format.
